issue.title: [C++] Add docker-compose entry for testing Debian Testing build with system packages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4732](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4732). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To better support people on Fedora and also show the missing things to get Arrow packaged into Debian, add an entry to the docker-compose.yml that builds on Debian Testing
